read(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic) - Method in class com.ble.ble.BleService

readDeviceInfo(String, DeviceInfo) - Method in class com.ble.ble.BleService
读取的数据在回调方法 BleCallBack.onCharacteristicRead(String, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int)中返回， 数据根据UUID来区分
readNotifyState(String, UUID, UUID) - Method in class com.ble.ble.BleService
读取Notify使能状态，读取结果在BleCallBack.onNotifyStateRead(UUID, UUID, boolean)中接收
readNotifyState(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic) - Method in class com.ble.ble.BleService
读取Notify使能状态，读取结果在BleCallBack.onNotifyStateRead(UUID, UUID, boolean)中接收
readReg(String, int) - Method in class com.ble.ble.BleService
读取寄存器数据
refresh(String) - Method in class com.ble.ble.BleService
清除连接过的设备在手机端的缓存信息，与重启手机蓝牙同样的效果，一般从机动态改变UUID时 （比如OAD升级）才需要调用该方法刷新UUID，因为清除缓存后会影响连接速度 注：连接状态下调用或者断线后立即调用才有效
